body_html:
Thanks @rryan for the review. The PR has been updated with alignment of \ fixed. Additional unit tests have also been added in pad_op_test.py for int64. Without the PR the new test case will trigger the crash.

Please take a look and let me know if there are any issues.
body_text:
Thanks @rryan for the review. The PR has been updated with alignment of \ fixed. Additional unit tests have also been added in pad_op_test.py for int64. Without the PR the new test case will trigger the crash.
Please take a look and let me know if there are any issues.
body:
Thanks @rryan for the review. The PR has been updated with alignment of `\` fixed. Additional unit tests have also been added in `pad_op_test.py` for `int64`. Without the PR the new test case will trigger the crash.

Please take a look and let me know if there are any issues.
